name: Supametas.AI
tagline: Make any data RAG-ready in seconds
description: We transform messy content from websites, documents, PDFs, blogs, podcasts, etc. into perfectly organized datasets. Our smart processing helps AI companies build better products by giving them clean, structured data without requiring data processing expertise.

name: Second.Me by Me.bot
tagline: The first network of AIs (Open Source)
description: Train and self-host your own AI while ensuring privacy protection. This AI will reflect your thoughts and preferences and even forms a new AI network.

name: OpenAI GPT-4o Audio Models
tagline: Build Powerful Voice Agents
description: New OpenAI audio models for developers: gpt-4o powered speech-to-text (more accurate than Whisper) and steerable text-to-speech. Build voice agents, transcriptions, and more.

name: Tails & Frames
tagline: Turn you pet recordings into shareable clips & memes
description: Tails & Frames is an application that transform any pet moment into viral magic. It turns your phone pics, camera clips, or even chaotic pet videos into share-worthy memes & artworks.

name: AI Tools Directory - by Whalesync
tagline: Discover the newest AI-powered apps (>1,000 and growing)
description: AI Tools Directory is... well basically what the title says :) We've collected >1,000 of the latest AI tools so you can stay up-to-date. Find the AI tool you need using search, filter by role (e.g. "Engineering"), or filter by tag (e.g. "Vector Database").

name: Strella Insights 2.0
tagline: Smarter search, faster insights, instant shareable clips
description: Introducing Strella Insights 2.0 - instant shareable clips from interview sessions, quantified analysis, and a new explorer feature, where you can chat with your entire research repository and create instant, shareable highlight reels.

name: Fast.io
tagline: Turn big data into big decisions, fast
description: Analyze thousands of files - docs, images, videos, and more. Use advanced agentic analysis to surpass basic AI tools, save time, cut chaos, and boost team productivity effortlessly.

name: cloudsquid
tagline: Instant data extraction from any file with AI
description: Cloudsquid solves document data workflows end to end with AI Agents. Upload any file, explain what data you need, let AI do the rest. This is your superhuman Data Engineer. No code required âœ¨

name: Street View Social
tagline: A platform to find and connect the people you grew up with
description: Reconnect with childhood friends, share memories of your old neighborhood, and discover the rich history of places that shaped your life. Every address becomes a digital guestbook waiting to be filled with stories, memories, and connections.

name: Papr.ai
tagline: AI-native docs with infinite memory
description: Papr is the first AI-native workspace with infinite memory, powered by state-of-the-art retrieval accuracy. Stop losing context across toolsâ€”Papr remembers everything from Slack, docs, and meetings. Teams work better, 3x faster. Your AI never forgets.

name: Camouflage for iOS
tagline: Redact photos with ease using emojis on iOS
description: No more fiddling with the markup tool in the Photos app to hide a face. Redact your favorite photos with emojis on iOS and protect the privacy of your loved ones. Camouflage automatically detects faces and overlays it with an emoji!

name: Chariot
tagline: Build websites fast with AI
description: Chariot is an AI web developer. Describe the website you want and Chariot will build it for you. No code required.

name: BrowseRead â€“ Challenge every article
tagline: Uncover hidden narratives in every article you read
description: BrowseRead analyzes news, blogs, and more, generating supporting and opposing arguments, predicting stock market impact, and recommending relevant booksâ€”helping you explore every angle, uncover hidden perspectives, and make informed decisions with confidence.

name: LinkJolt
tagline: Powerful affiliate management for saas companies
description: Create and manage affiliate campaigns with LinkJolt. Track conversions, manage commissions, and scale your SaaS business with our powerful affiliate management platform.

name: Stress Relief
tagline: Your path to peace simply!
description: Stress Relief is a thoughtfully designed app that helps you manage stress and find calm amidst your daily hustle. With personalized relaxation techniques, guided meditations, and simple yet effective exercises.

name: AI Video Subtitler
tagline: Add subtitles to video effortlessly â€“ free, open-source tool
description: Add subtitles to your videos in just two clicks with this free, open-source tool. Simply upload your video, customize the subtitles to your liking, and theyâ€™re added instantly. User-friendly design ensures a smooth, efficient experience from start to finish.

name: TallyCal
tagline: Simple polls for group scheduling
description: Scheduling group meetings is a hassleâ€”TallyCal makes it effortless! Quickly send a poll, find the best time, and lock it inâ€”ad-free and hassle-free!

name: Pablooo.club - Free screenshots library
tagline: Like Mobbin & Refero BUT free, collaborative & powered by AI
description: Benchmark easily with a free library of screenshots updated everyday by the community. ðŸ¤© +1700 screenshots available ðŸ”Ž Search with AI semantic to find specific user stories ðŸ“š Build you own personal library The perfect spot for designers, PMs and app lovers.

name: Clara - Your Private AI Partner
tagline: Free Private AI App for Mac - Image Gen, AI Agents & Chat
description: Meet Clara, your private AI on Mac, Windows, and beyondâ€”no cloud, no data sharing, just fast, secure intelligence at your fingertips. From chat and automation to image generation, Clara empowers you to create, innovate, and stay in controlâ€”completely offline.

name: WaitKit - Waitlist with Referrals
tagline: Transforms pre-launch signups into a viral growth engine.
description: WaitKit provides tools for referral-based signups, allowing users to share their unique referral links to move up a waitlist. Track referral effectiveness and automated engagement features such as email reminders and milestone rewards to keep users engaged.
